metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7271 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Simple Desktop Display Manager (SDDM) before 0.10.0 allows local users to log in as user "sddm" without authentication.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sddm - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-circles - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-elarun - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-maldives - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
sddm-theme-maui - 0.13.0-1ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sddm package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13.0-1ubuntu5').
